item.title: Lumbridge Stairs... of doom
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Lets see, I think to go up on the second floor is the second option, no? Lets take a look at this: http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Object_action_2

You can see that the data defines these things:

Big Endian Short Special A - The objects ID.
Little Endian Short Special A - The objects Y coordinate.
Short Special A - The objects X coordinate.

Now, you just have to add a check to see if the object that you are clicking has that id, and if it does, check to see if it’s located at that location (since there are many objects on the map with that id), and if so, move the player.

Read full topic

item.title: Lumbridge Stairs... of doom
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

There is a file that directs all packets, to a certain class, if these object clicking classes aren’t already defined, you must do so. Then, do something like

switch(object.getId()) {
case 1234:
    if (object.getLocation() == loc) {
        //Move the player, etc.
    }
break;
}

Kinda thing, you trackin?

Read full topic

item.title: Lumbridge Stairs... of doom
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Object_action_1
http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Object_action_2
http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Object_action_3

Make sure the above packets are defined. If they are, 2 should be to go up, and 3 to go down on the stair options. For the first option you could just use a Dialogue like RS does.

item.title: Lumbridge Stairs... of doom
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

[quote=“The Unholy, post:1, topic:467001”]My base is Project Insanity

I’ve managed to get the lumbridge stairs to work properly (below is my code)

case 1738: c.getPA().movePlayer(3205, 3209, 1); break; case 1739: c.getPA().movePlayer(3205, 3209, 2); break; case 1740: c.getPA().movePlayer(3205, 3209, 1); break;

However on the second floor, how would I get the right click options to work so that I can go up or down because at the moment after going up you’re otherwise stuck on the first floor? Rep++ will be given & all help is appreciated:D[/quote]

Good luck repping anyone

Read full topic

item.title: Lumbridge Stairs... of doom
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

My base is Project Insanity

I’ve managed to get the lumbridge stairs to work properly (below is my code)

case 1738: c.getPA().movePlayer(3205, 3209, 1); break; case 1739: c.getPA().movePlayer(3205, 3209, 2); break; case 1740: c.getPA().movePlayer(3205, 3209, 1); break;

However on the second floor, how would I get the right click options to work so that I can go up or down because at the moment after going up you’re otherwise stuck on the first floor? All help is appreciated:D
